snippet.title: UnderMine 2 - Title Track
snippet.description:
UnderMine 2's opening theme and title sequence. Some keen-eyed fans may even spot some important information. 

Title Music by Wesley Slover

UnderMine 2 releases into Steam Early Access on July 22nd, 2025. You can play a demo of it early in Steam's Next Fest, starting June 9th. 

To be notified about these dates, make sure to wishlist UnderMine 2 on Steam!
https://undermine2.game/steam

For other announcements, follow UnderMine 2 on social media!
https://bsky.app/profile/undermine.game
https://instagram.com/undermine_game/
https://tiktok.com/@undermine_game

UnderMine merch is currently 90% off at the Dual Wield store:
https://dualwieldstudio.com/collections/undermine
